violations.description: More than 1000 people in a single zone at any time.
violations.recommendation: Reduce the number of people in the zone.

violations.description: No persons should be nearby unless they have badges of colors green, light blue, dark blue, purple, orange, black.
violations.recommendation: Ensure that only authorized personnel are in the zone.

violations.description: Flag unattended bags, weapons, or unknown packages.
violations.recommendation: Inspect unattended items in the zone.

violations.description: Flag any fighting, running, or aggressive gestures.
violations.recommendation: Stop the behavior and report it to management.

violations.description: All persons in work zones must wear required PPE (hard hat, vest).
violations.recommendation: Ensure that all personnel are wearing the correct PPE.

report.summary: The observation is non-compliant with several rules. The risk score indicates a high level of risk due to the presence of more than 1000 people in a single zone and unauthorized personnel nearby.
